greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction for sum(k>=1, (2^k-1)^(-2) ).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
program: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 2400); x=contfrac(x=suminf(k=1, 1/(2^k - 1)^2)); for (n=1, 2000, write("b078075.txt", n, " ", x[n])) } /* Harry J. Smith, Oct 19 2009 */
results.author: _Frank Ellermann_, Feb 23 2002
